name: Tic Tac Toe 2 player games with Sly Kitties!
name_original: Tic Tac Toe 2 player games with Sly Kitties!
description:
New game from the guys that brought you Sly Kittens! Merged cats get angry!

Play Tic Tac Toe (Noughts & Crosses) game with your friends with the cute characters of Sly Kittens!

Featues:
- Endless Tic Tac Toe field - much more fun than classic 3x3 field!
- Develops your logic and strategic thinking!
- Everybody knows the rules of the game!
- Enough Kitties to make you smile!
- Nice music and sounds!
- Challenge your friends!
- Cute animation!
